snippet: SHASHA--Hanina. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Hanina Shasha, preceded in death by her husband, Alfred. She leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Hanina's children, Carol Green (Joe), Robert (Ellen), and Dennis (Karen); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHASHA--Hanina. UJA-Federation of New York mourns the passing of Hanina Shasha, preceded in death by her husband, Alfred. She leaves behind a loving family who will carry on a tradition of exceptional Jewish philanthropy. We extend our condolences to Hanina's children, Carol Green (Joe), Robert (Ellen), and Dennis (Karen); her grandchildren; and the entire family. Alisa R. Doctoroff, President; Linda Mirels, Chair of the Board; Eric S. Goldstein, CEO 1/3
